author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower curb tile tips…I place the factory edge on the tile floor and mark the curb location on the tile. I score and snap on the Montolit Masterpiuma and use a Rock Steady hand polishing pad to smooth the edge. The small gap will get color matching silicone down the road 🔥
title: Shower Curb Tile Tips - #shorts #tileshower #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
